reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 88/23: ADDITIONAL OBJECT OF THE CORPORATION

content.content: 1. (1) The following is prescribed as an additional object of the Corporation: 1.  To support the development of transit-oriented community projects as defined in the Transit-Oriented Communities Act, 2020. (2) For greater certainty, in carrying out its object as described in paragraph 1 of subsection (1), the Corporation may, (a)  acquire, by expropriation or otherwise, interests in real or personal property; or (b)  hold, lease, dispose of interests in real or personal property.
content.raw_html:
1. (1) The following is prescribed as an additional object of the Corporation:

1.  To support the development of transit-oriented community projects as defined in the Transit-Oriented Communities Act, 2020.

(2) For greater certainty, in carrying out its object as described in paragraph 1 of subsection (1), the Corporation may,

(a)  acquire, by expropriation or otherwise, interests in real or personal property; or

(b)  hold, lease, dispose of interests in real or personal property.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
